H0.text: Motor Racing. Which team has announced that they are to withdraw from Formula One racing at the end of the year. Toyota

H1.text: Motor Racing. Which team has announced that they are to withdraw from Formula One racing at the end of the year. Renault

H2.text: Motor Racing. Which team has announced that they are to withdraw from Formula One racing at the end of the year. Honda

H3.text: Motor Racing. Which team has announced that they are to withdraw from Formula One racing at the end of the year. Bmw

A4.text: Toyota announced its immediate withdrawal from Formula One on 4 November 2009.

A5.text: Toyota decided to withdraw from Formula One with immediate effect on 4 November 2009.
